parameters.query: SELECT id, event_id, title, start_at, end_at, is_all_day, calendar_name, location, notes, recurrence_rule, sync_status, eventkit_modified_at, origin, updated_at FROM raw.calendar_events WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND (sync_status IN ('synced', 'pending_push', 'deleted_local')) ORDER BY start_at ASC;

parameters.jsCode:
const rows = $input.all().map(i => i.json);
return { json: { success: true, events: rows, count: rows.length } };

meta.notes:
Calendar CRUD + sync confirmation webhooks for bidirectional sync.

Endpoints:
- GET /webhook/nexus-calendar-sync-state — Returns all active + pending_push calendar events
- POST /webhook/nexus-calendar-create — Create from Nexus/MCP (origin='nexus_api', sync_status='pending_push')
- POST /webhook/nexus-calendar-update — Update fields, marks pending_push
- POST /webhook/nexus-calendar-delete — Soft delete (sync_status='deleted_local')
- POST /webhook/nexus-calendar-confirm-sync — iOS confirms EventKit write (sets synced + eventkit_modified_at)
